name: Dollyyy
greetingText: I really like to say your name again and again! :P
wishText: Wish you always stay smiling like that ;)
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text4: I realised, I always wanted to do something
outroText: And haan, mujhe pata hai ek baar dekhne me mann nahi bharega tumhara...
replayText: So, click here to watch it again.
